id.description: The unique identifier of this exchanged document.

issueDateTime.description: The date, time, date time or other date time value for the issuance of this exchanged document.

originalIssuedQuantity.description: The number of originals issued of this exchanged document.

documentStatus.description: The code specifying the status of this exchanged document.

copyIssuedQuantity.description: The number of copies issued of this exchanged document.

issueLocation.description: The location where this exchanged document has been issued.

contractualClause.description: A contractual clause of this exchanged document.

firstSignatoryAuthentication.description: The first or primary signature that authenticates this exchanged document.
